speaker: Archives Colonnade
lines: Columns keep the roof from forgetting; ivy keeps the columns from forgetting.
Niches hold busts of Deans who look like they still grade papers.
A skylight leaks stars in the daytime.
A list of banned tomes is posted; it updates itself by sighing.
Footsteps hush themselves as they pass here.
A maintenance mage nudges a lantern back to sensible.
A door to the Restricted stacks is barred by runes and common sense.
If you already paid a price for knowledge, the runes might be in the mood to listen.

choices.text: Try the latch when no one looks.
